DOC.brief_summary: The female condom offer woman potentially important option HIV prevention . This study develop evaluate health education program increase female condom use among ethnically diverse woman .
DOC.brief_title: Education Program Promote Female Condom Use
DOC.detailed_description: AIDS incidence among woman grow alarm rate since 1985 . Heterosexual contact great risk HIV infection woman . Women United States urgently need option protect HIV . Nonetheless , limited prevention effort target woman . The female condom potentially important option HIV prevention woman . However , little research conduct identify effective approach promote female condom female-controlled barrier method available date . This study develop theoretically empirically base intervention increase female condom use among ethnically diverse woman engage multiple sexual partnership . The propose female condom skill train intervention applies social cognitive theory . It also incorporate extensive previous research examine female condom acceptability identify attitudinal , interpersonal , sociocultural factor affect female condom use . The intervention consist four session : 1 ) individual safer sex education condom use skills training ; 2 ) group discussion barrier female condom use ; 3 ) group condom negotiation skill training ; 4 ) individual condom use counseling . The efficacy intervention assess compare control condition intervention focus woman 's general health issue unrelated HIV/AIDS . The control condition intervention four session : 1 ) individual health education ; 2 ) group discussion woman 's health problem relate risk behavior ; 3 ) group discussion healthy living ; 4 ) individual health risk reduction counsel . This study use randomize clinical trial design . Study participant randomly assign one two condition : female condom skill train woman 's general health promotion . All participant interview study entry , 3 month , 6 month . Attitudinal , psychosexual , behavioral data collect evaluate intervention .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria African American , Asian American , Latina , White Two male sexual partner year prior study entry English speaking Exclusion Criteria Commercial sex worker Planning move within 6 month study entry Allergic polyurethane , latex , lubricant
